title: Update Case Calendar with New Date
description: A deposition has been rescheduled. A paralegal needs to update the case calendar.

tasks.description: Locate the existing calendar entry for the deposition.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the correct event on the calendar.

tasks.description: Update the entry with the new date and time.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully changes the date of the event.

tasks.description: Ensure all original attendees are still on the invitation and send an update notification.
tasks.expected_outcome: All parties are notified of the new schedule.
